= Credits =

SASAPI was built and is maintained by  [http://sekati.com Jason M Horwitz] [mailto:sekati@gmail.com <sekati@gmail.com>], thanks largely to the direct and indirect contributions via knowledge and code sharing of several friends, colleagues and other open source projects.

I have tried to make mention in source comments when code was derived, adapted or adopted, or from others work. However, since I tend to keep wretched track of these things in the heat of the moment (or the middle of the night), I would like to use this space to direct your attention to this excellent, though not at all comprehensive list of individuals who's work deserves attention:

=== Notes to Project Members ===

Upon contributing work to FDTKit you may [http://fdt.powerflasher.com/index.php?page=os apply to PowerFlashers for an FDT3 OS License] as a new project member.
